AT.name: Shantae and the Pirate's Curse
AT.description: 50% Preisnachlass, wenn du Shantae and the Pirate's Curse für Wii U™ besitzt!* *Deine Wii U und dein Nintendo 3DS™ müssen mit derselben Nintendo Network ID verknüpft sein. Breche in ein neues Abenteuer mit Shantae, dem bauchtanzenden Djinni, auf. Shantae muss sich mit ihrer Erzfeindin, der Piratin Risky Boots verbünden, um Sequin Land zu retten. Als Pirat bekommt Shantae neue Waffen, um ihre Abenteuer zu bestehen... und hoffentlich ihre Magie zurückzugewinnen!

AU.name: Shantae and the Pirate's Curse
AU.description: 50% off if you own Shantae and the Pirate's Curse on Wii U™!* *Your Wii U and Nintendo 3DS™ must be linked with the same Nintendo Network ID. Embark on a brand new adventure with Shantae, the hair-whipping belly dancing genie. When she loses her magic, Shantae must team up with her nemesis, the nefarious pirate Risky Boots in order to save Sequin Land from an evil curse. As a pirate, Shantae gains new weapons to advance her quest, slay monsters, battle epic bosses… and hopefully get her magic back in the bargain! But can she really trust her deadliest enemy? The third Shantae game is the biggest yet! Beyond Sequin Land lie cursed islands and labyrinths each hiding a new piece of Pirate Gear - Flintlock Pistol, Pirate Hat, Scimitar, Risky's Boots, and even a Cannon. Upgrade Shantae's hair and weapons or unlock advanced Fighter's Moves. Locate maps, return lost Heart Squids, collect rare loot, and laugh out loud at the weird, wild, and wonderfully humorous cast of characters. Incredible stereoscopic visuals, unlockable Pirate-Mode, multiple endings, and an unforgettable soundtrack make this one game you won't want to miss!

BG.name: Shantae and the Pirate's Curse

BE.name: Shantae and the Pirate's Curse
BE.description: -50% si vous possédez Shantae and the Pirate's Curse sur Nintendo 3DS™ !* *Votre Wii U et votre Nintendo 3DS doivent être liées au même identifiant Nintendo Network. Embarquez dans une nouvelle aventure avec Shantae, la génie danseuse du ventre. Après avoir perdu sa magie, Shantae doit s'allier à son ennemie jurée Risky Boots afin de sauver Sequin Land d'une malédiction. En tant que pirate, Shantae gagne de nouvelles armes pour avancer dans sa quête... et récupérer ses pouvoirs !

IT.name: Shantae and the Pirate's Curse
IT.description: 50% di sconto se hai già Shantae and the Pirate's Curse su Wii U™!* *I tuoi Wii U e Nintendo 3DS™ devono essere collegati con lo stesso Nintendo Network ID. Parti per una nuova avventura con Shantae, la danzatrice del ventre genio dai portentosi capelli. Dopo aver perso la sua magia Shantae collabora con il tremendo pirata Risky Boots per salvare Sequin Land da una maledizione. Shantae trova nuove armi per la sua missione, uccide mostri, sconfigge grandi nemici... e spera di ritrovare la sua magia!

Beyond Sequin Land lie cursed islands and labyrinths each hiding a new piece of Pirate Gear - Flintlock Pistol, Pirate Hat, Scimitar, Risky's Boots, and even a Cannon. Upgrade Shantae's hair and weapons or unlock advanced Fighter's Moves. Locate maps, return lost Heart Squids, collect rare loot, and laugh out loud at the weird, wild, and wonderfully humorous cast of characters. Incredible stereoscopic visuals, unlockable Pirate-Mode, multiple endings, and an unforgettable soundtrack make this one game you won't want to miss!
